job.title: Data Engineer Jr/Mid - 100K-140K DOE with Security Clearance
job.description:
• Minimum Active Top Secret Level Security Clearance experience in full stack development, including front end and back end
coding and a thorough knowledge of the SDLC

experience designing and developing real time ETL architecture for real time

predictive analytics.

experience with Apache Hive, Apache Spark and Apache Yarn

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics or other business-

Related Field Preferred
  • 5+ years of relevant consulting or industry experience
  • Interest in event streaming architectures, such as Apache Kafka
  • Creativity and innovation – desire to learn and apply new technologies, products, and
libraries
  • Prior professional services or federal consulting experience
